name: gns3-mcp
description: Control and automate GNS3 network labs through Claude with type-safe operations
long_description:
Version 0.6.3: FIXED - Font fallback chain for consistent cross-platform rendering. TypeWriter and other fonts now include CSS-style fallbacks (TypeWriter → Courier New → Courier → Liberation Mono → Consolas → monospace) ensuring consistent appearance in SVG/PNG exports across all systems. Version 0.6.2: FIXED - Node label positioning in export_topology_diagram() now matches official GNS3 GUI rendering. Labels no longer offset incorrectly, text-anchor dynamically set based on position. Version 0.6.1: FIXED - All newlines automatically converted to 
 (CR+LF) for console compatibility. Copy-paste multi-line text directly - newlines just work! send_console() and send_and_wait_console() normalize all line endings (
, , 
 → 
). NEW: send_keystroke() for TUI navigation and vim editing (arrows, enter sends 
, backspace, delete, tab, esc, ctrl sequences, f1-f12). FIXED: detect_console_state() checks only last non-empty line (not 5 lines), preventing old prompt detection. FIXED: MikroTik password patterns now match 'new password>' not 'new password:'. Version 0.6.0: Added interactive console tools - send_and_wait_console() waits for prompt pattern (regex, 0.5s polling), detect_console_state() auto-detects device type (Cisco IOS, MikroTik, Juniper, Arista, Linux) and identifies 9 console states with confidence scoring. Version 0.5.0: Port status indicators on topology export. Version 0.3.0: Type-safe Pydantic models, two-phase link validation, performance caching. Supports GNS3 v3 API.

gns3_host.title: GNS3 Server Host
gns3_host.description: GNS3 server hostname or IP address

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List all GNS3 projects (returns JSON array of ProjectInfo)

tools.name: open_project
tools.description: Open a GNS3 project by name (returns JSON ProjectInfo)

tools.name: list_nodes
tools.description: List all nodes in current project (returns JSON array of NodeInfo)

tools.name: get_node_details
tools.description: Get detailed node information (returns JSON NodeInfo)

tools.name: get_links
tools.description: List all network links with adapters/ports (returns JSON array of LinkInfo)

tools.name: set_node
tools.description: Configure node properties and/or control state (start/stop/suspend/reload/restart)

tools.name: send_console
tools.description: Send commands to node console (auto-connects if needed)

tools.name: read_console
tools.description: Read console output (full buffer or diff mode)

tools.name: disconnect_console
tools.description: Disconnect from node console session (returns JSON status)

tools.name: get_console_status
tools.description: Check console connection status for a node (returns JSON ConsoleStatus)

tools.name: send_and_wait_console
tools.description: Send command and wait for specific prompt pattern (returns JSON with output, pattern_found, timeout_occurred)

tools.name: detect_console_state
tools.description: Analyze console output to detect device type and current state (returns JSON with state, device type, confidence)

tools.name: send_keystroke
tools.description: Send special keystroke to console (arrows, enter, backspace, delete, tab, esc, ctrl sequences, f1-f12)

tools.name: set_connection
tools.description: Batch manage network connections with two-phase validation (requires adapters)

tools.name: delete_node
tools.description: Delete a node from the current project

tools.name: list_templates
tools.description: List all available GNS3 templates (returns JSON array of TemplateInfo)

tools.name: create_node
tools.description: Create a new node from a template at specified coordinates

tools.name: list_drawings
tools.description: List all drawing objects in current project (returns JSON array of DrawingInfo)

tools.name: create_rectangle
tools.description: Create a colored rectangle drawing with customizable fill and border

tools.name: create_text
tools.description: Create a text label with formatting (bold, font size, color)

tools.name: delete_drawing
tools.description: Delete a drawing object from the current project

tools.name: create_ellipse
tools.description: Create an ellipse or circle drawing with customizable fill and border

tools.name: export_topology_diagram
tools.description: Export topology as SVG and/or PNG diagram with nodes, links, and drawings
